name: Lawyer Guy: Defender of Justice (itch)
description:
Lawyer Guy: Defender of Justice

Lawyer Guy: Defender of Justice is a running, jumping and shooting action platformer game, currently in development for Windows (and Linux, soon). Free, downloadable preview levels of the game will be posted here regularly!

When you're done playing the game, please check my website and fill out the corresponding playtester feedback form. I take feedback very seriously!
